Key: My, Shido-san. Welcome home.
O-Oh! Kurumi, what are you doing here?
I was waiting for your return.
I-I see... This feels new...

My, my... So you must be remembering what happened
earlier. That was a purely fictitious incident.
I am not usually that unruly.

Y-Yeah, I'm sure. But, it was refreshing to see
that side of you, Kurumi.

Hehe. It was new for me as well having you take
care of me so much. We can continue where we
left off.

No offense, but seriously no thanks. My heart
wouldn't last...

My, my... That's unfortunate. So then, what
happened to Arusu-san? It appears she's not
home yet.

What? Really? Oh come to think of it, I was
looking for Maria and I forgot...
That sounds quite rude of you.

W-Well, I didn't mean for it to be... Anyways,
I should go look for her. She may still be at
school.
If you don't mind, I will join you.
What...?

(This is a weird situation. I never thought I'd go
looking for Maria with Kurumi.)
Here.
Ahh!

My, Shido-san. You sure scream like a maiden. You
don't have to be so scared. I won't eat you alive.
When you say that, it doesn't sound like a joke!

I mean, we're alone, but you're so deep in
thought. It's rude to ignore a girl like this.
Oh, sorry.
Were you thinking about Arusu-san?

Kind of... I'm just not sure if I'm able to show
her what she wants. I'm not very confident
that I can.

Oh? How rare. Shido-san, you've always been so
unjustifiably confident.
Is that what you think of me?

Once you say it, you make it happen. That is the
kind of person you are.
Hm... I'm not sure if you're comforting me...

Well, neither do I. Anyways, we're almost at the
school. Do you have any idea where she could be?
Hm... I'm not sure.
There you are... Maria, let's go home.
Shido? So you've found me.

What's the matter, Maria? Did you find something
interesting at school?
...Yes. There was something like that.
What was it?

More importantly... I'm happy that you've come to
look for me.
M-Maria?! What's the matter...?!
Just as I thought. The reaction I expected.
Th-The reaction you expected? What do you mean?

I thought that if I did this, you'd come looking
for me. If you do this in a game, your heart skips
a beat, right?
Maria...

(I knew it. I think Maria is slowly starting to
change.)
(I think Maria is slowly starting to change.)

This is all very nice, but we should head home
soon or it'll be late. Or... do you plan on
staying like that forever, Shido-san?

Oh, uh, no. Let's go home! Maria, you're good,
right?
Yes, that was plenty.

(With that said, Maria moved away from me and
began to walk.)

You sure seem to be happy. Aren't you glad,
Shido-san?
N-No... It's not like that.
